title: Client turning off the fucking animatons.
body: I did not do anything and there's no option to turn them back on, ffs why are my champ select animations turned off.

replies.body: Do you happen to have the  "Enable Low Spec Mode" option turned on? To check: press the gear on the top right of the client, then go to general. It should be the first option. I think if low spec mode is turned on some of the animations won't play in the client.

I also had this problem many many times, and No, I dont have the "Enable Low Spec Mode" turned on.
The client suddenly decides to not show animations{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot BlueMonday,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WtNMOs5F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-25T06:59:09.739+0000)
>
> Do you happen to have the  "Enable Low Spec Mode" option turned on? To check: press the gear on the top right of the client, then go to general. It should be the first option. I think if low spec mode is turned on some of the animations won't play in the client.

Nope, it's turned off.
